net.hudup.core.client

Class ProtocolImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.client.ProtocolImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Protocol
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDelegator, SocketWrapper

    public class ProtocolImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Protocol
    This class is the current implementation of Protocol interface. It implements all methods of protocol interface for interacting with Hudup server in client-server mechanism. All methods return requests.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

    • Method Detail

      • createEstimateRequest

        public Request createEstimateRequest(RecommendParam param,
                                     java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> queryIds)
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Creating estimation request based on specified recommendation parameter and specified set of identifiers (IDs). Such IDs can be user IDs or item IDs. This request is requirement of estimating rating values of such IDs. Method estimate(...) of Recommender class is responsible to satisfy this request.
        Specified by:
        createEstimateRequest in interface Protocol
        Parameters:
        param - specified recommendation parameter. Recommendation parameter contains important information as follows:
        • Initial rating vector which can be user rating vector or item rating vector.
        • A profile which can be user profile containing user information (ID, name, etc.) or item profile containing item information (ID, name, price, etc.).
        • A context list relevant to how and where user (s) rates (rate) on item (s).
        • Additional information must be serializable.
        queryIds - specified set of identifiers (IDs). Such IDs can be user IDs or item IDs.
        Returns:
        estimation request based on specified recommendation parameter and specified set of identifiers (IDs).

      • createRecommendRequest

        public Request createRecommendRequest(RecommendParam param,
                                      int maxRecommend)
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Creating recommendation request based on the specified recommendation parameter and the specified maximum number of recommended items. This request asks the Hudup server (recommendation server) about producing a list of recommended items. Method recommend(...) of Recommender class is responsible for producing such list.
        Specified by:
        createRecommendRequest in interface Protocol
        Parameters:
        param - specified recommendation parameter. Recommendation parameter contains important information as follows:
        • Initial rating vector which can be user rating vector or item rating vector.
        • A profile which can be user profile containing user information (ID, name, etc.) or item profile containing item information (ID, name, price, etc.).
        • A context list relevant to how and where user (s) rates (rate) on item (s).
        • Additional information must be serializable.
        maxRecommend - specified maximum number of recommended items.
        Returns:
        recommendation request based on the specified recommendation parameter and the specified maximum number of recommended items.

      • createRecommendUserRequest

        public Request createRecommendUserRequest(int userId,
                                          int maxRecommend)
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Creating recommendation request for the specified user. This request asks the Hudup server (recommendation server) about producing a list of recommended items for specified user. The maximum number of recommended items is specified the input parameter maxRecommend. Method recommend(...) of Recommender class is responsible for producing such list.
        Specified by:
        createRecommendUserRequest in interface Protocol
        Parameters:
        userId - identifier (ID) of specified user.
        maxRecommend - maximum number of recommended items.
        Returns:
        recommendation request for the specified user.

      • createRecommendletRequest

        public Request createRecommendletRequest(java.lang.String host,
                                         int port,
                                         java.lang.String regName,
                                         java.io.Serializable externalUserId,
                                         java.io.Serializable externalItemId,
                                         int maxRecommend,
                                         Rating rating)
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        This method is responsible for creating a request for generating a recommendlet, based on many input parameters. Recommendlet represented by Recommendlet class is a service or a small graphic user interface (GUI) that allows users to see and interact with a list of recommended items. Recommendlet is now deprecated.
        Specified by:
        createRecommendletRequest in interface Protocol
        Parameters:
        host - specified host.
        port - specified port.
        regName - registered name of recommendlet.
        externalUserId - specified external user identifier (user ID).
        externalItemId - specified external item identifier (item ID).
        maxRecommend - the maximum number of recommended items.
        rating - rating value for updating.
        Returns:
        request for generating a recommendlet, based on many input parameters.

      • createGetUserAttributeListRequest

        public Request createGetUserAttributeListRequest()
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Creating a request for getting attribute list of user profiles. Note, attribute list contains many attributes. Attribute represented by Attribute class indicates the data type, which is also a wrapper of data type. Profile is one of important data structures, like record of table in database, has a list of values. Each value belongs to a particular attribute. Profile uses attribute to specify its data types and so profile owns a reference to an attribute list. Please see AttributeList class for details about attribute list. All profiles of users share the same attribute list.
        Specified by:
        createGetUserAttributeListRequest in interface Protocol
        Returns:
        request for getting attribute list of user profile.

      • createInsertUserProfileRequest

        public Request createInsertUserProfileRequest(Profile profile,
                                              ExternalRecord externalRecord)
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Creating a request for inserting user profile based on specified profile and external record. Note, profile is one of important data structures, like record of table in database, has a list of values. Each value belongs to a particular attribute. External record represented by ExternalRecord class is a record (a row in table) which is stored in other database (different from the framework database). It is opposite to internal record represented by InternalRecord class which is a record stored in the framework database.
        Specified by:
        createInsertUserProfileRequest in interface Protocol
        Parameters:
        profile - specified user profile.
        externalRecord - specified external record.
        Returns:
        request for inserting user profile based on specified profile and external record.

      • createGetItemAttributeListRequest

        public Request createGetItemAttributeListRequest()
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Creating a request for getting attribute list of items. Note, attribute list contains many attributes. Attribute represented by Attribute class indicates the data type, which is also a wrapper of data type. Profile is one of important data structures, like record of table in database, has a list of values. Each value belongs to a particular attribute. Profile uses attribute to specify its data types and so profile owns a reference to an attribute list. Note, all item profiles in framework database share the same attribute list. Please see AttributeList class for details about attribute list.
        Specified by:
        createGetItemAttributeListRequest in interface Protocol
        Returns:
        request for getting attribute list of items.

      • createInsertItemProfileRequest

        public Request createInsertItemProfileRequest(Profile profile,
                                              ExternalRecord externalRecord)
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Creating a request for inserting a specified item profile together with a specified external record. Note, profile is one of important data structures, like record of table in database, has a list of values. Each value belongs to a particular attribute. External record represented by ExternalRecord class is a record (a row in table) which is stored in other database (different from the framework database). It is opposite to internal record represented by InternalRecord class which is a record stored in the framework database.
        Specified by:
        createInsertItemProfileRequest in interface Protocol
        Parameters:
        profile - specified item profile.
        externalRecord - specified external record.
        Returns:
        request for inserting a specified item profile together with a specified external record.

        public Request createGetItemExternalRecordRequest(int itemId)
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Creating a request for getting external record of a specified item. It is opposite to internal record represented by InternalRecord class which is a record stored in the framework database.
        Specified by:
        createGetItemExternalRecordRequest in interface Protocol

      • createGetNominalRequest

        public Request createGetNominalRequest(java.lang.String unit,
                                       java.lang.String attribute)
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Creating a request for getting nominal (s) by specified unit and attribute. Nominal data indicates discrete and non-number data such as weekdays {Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday}. Nominal data is called nominal, in brief, represented by Nominal class. Unit represents a CSV file, database table, Excel sheet, etc. Unit is used to store object such as user profile, item profile, rating matrix, etc. Attribute represented by Attribute class indicates the data type, which is also a wrapper of data type. If unit is database table, an attribute is identical to a field.
        Specified by:
        createGetNominalRequest in interface Protocol
        Parameters:
        unit - specified unit name.
        attribute - specified attribute name.
        Returns:
        request for getting nominal (s) by specified unit and attribute.

        Creating a request for checking whether an account is valid with regard to specified password and specified privileges. Account is the information of a user who has access to the server with her/his privileges. Account is modeled and stored in framework database as profile.

      • createGetSampleProfileAttributeListRequest

        public Request createGetSampleProfileAttributeListRequest()
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Creating a request for getting the attribute list of profiles in sample unit. Note, attribute list contains many attributes. Attribute represented by Attribute class indicates the data type, which is also a wrapper of data type. Profile is one of important data structures, like record of table in database, has a list of values. Each value belongs to a particular attribute. Profile uses attribute to specify its data types and so profile owns a reference to an attribute list. Please see AttributeList class for details about attribute list. Unit represents a CSV file, database table, Excel sheet, etc. Unit is used to store object such as user profile, item profile, rating matrix, etc. Profiles in the same unit have the same attribute list.
        Specified by:
        createGetSampleProfileAttributeListRequest in interface Protocol
        Returns:
        Request.

      • createGetServerConfigRequest

        public Request createGetServerConfigRequest()
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Hudup server owns a configuration which includes some server information such as server port, the period in miliseconds that the Hudup server does periodically internal tasks. This method creates a request for retrieving such server configuration.
        Specified by:
        createGetServerConfigRequest in interface Protocol
        Returns:
        request for retrieving server configuration.

      • createGetSessionAttributeRequest

        public Request createGetSessionAttributeRequest(java.lang.String attribute)
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Creating a request for retrieving an attribute having the specified name of the current session in server. Hudup server (recommendation server) serves all incoming request in a time interval (a period in mili-seconds). Such time interval is called session. Each session has a number of attributes. Each attribute is a pair of key and value. Key is also called name. When it is time-out which means that the server has received no request after the time interval then, the session is destroyed, which causes that all attributes are destroyed.
        Specified by:
        createGetSessionAttributeRequest in interface Protocol
        Parameters:
        attribute - specified attribute name.
        Returns:
        request for retrieving an attribute having the specified name of the current session in server.

      • createGetSnapshotRequest

        public Request createGetSnapshotRequest()
        Description copied from interface: Protocol
        Creating a request for retrieving an image of dataset owned by Hudup server at current time point. Such image is snapshot stored in memory. Snapshot is represented by Snapshot class.
        Specified by:
        createGetSnapshotRequest in interface Protocol
        Returns:
        a request for retrieving an image (called snapshot) of dataset owned by Hudup server
